title: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman (Tekkaman)
synopsis: Tekkaman is just an average bright boy in his everyday life. However, modern science can turn him into a mighty space warrior. This becomes a reality when aggressive aliens come from space to invade our planet. Armed with a space lance, Tekkaman gallantly goes into action against the grotesque space creatures. During his battles he encounters a mysterious young man from another planet who helps him out whenever he is in danger.
voices: ['Mori, Katsuji', 'Ueda, Miyuki', 'Komiya, Kazue', 'Yamada, Yasuo', 'Nakae, Shinji', 'Kuwabara, Takeshi', 'Takiguchi, Junpei']
staff: [['Kuri, Ippei', ['Producer', ' Original Creator']], ['Sasagawa, Hiroshi', ['Director']], ['Toriumi, Hisayuki', ['Director']], ['Chiba, Kouichi', ['Sound Director']]]
